item.title: Ongoing Fly-Tipping Issue – Request for Action and CCTV Consideration, 3rd July
item.description:
I’m writing to report another incident of fly-tipping outside Sondes Street - SE17 . A number of boxes and other rubbish have been dumped again, and this is becoming a recurring issue. I’ve noticed that the boxes have an address on them, and it’s the same address as previous incidents of fly-tipping in this area. Given that this is not the first time and the materials dumped point to the same source, I’m struggling to understand why CCTV cameras have not been installed to deter or trace the person responsible. This ongoing issue is affecting the cleanliness and safety of the area, and I’d appreciate some clarity on how the council plans to prevent further incidents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sondes Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
